Translations.Text: Akka. Win iaaqben akken ippuaaqeb, sinna, ipwadnes, war ccekk, a t Isellek Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ipqili, Ipsemmie
Akka, acku Oebbi Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. U Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Akka, acku Oebbi d tidep, ma d ayen u$uo pnujun, war Neppa, d tikerkas. Ih, Oebbi d Aalayan, d Ameqwoan
Day ur twalav ara Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni, d$a izzegzew wakal? Ih, Oebbi d Laiif, Ieoa
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ih, Oebbi, ar Neppa d Asaay d Amaazuz

Ur twalav ara Oebbi Inub ed fellawen s wayen illan di tmurt, akked lbabur ippazalen di yill, s lameo iS. Iiief igenni ur d i$elli f tmurt, siwa ma Iunef as. Ih, Oebbi, war ccekk, Issuruf u Ipeunu i imdanen
D Neppa ikwen Issadren, sinna, ara kwen In$en, sinna, ara kwen id Issadren. Amdan, s tidep, d ajehli
I yal lois, Nefka asekkir, teddun degs. Ulay$eo i k pna$en $ef lameo. Nuj ar Mass ik; ih, aql ak, kecc, di nnhaya tuwqimt
Ma numren k, ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen ayen txeddmem
Oebbi ad Ieudd garawen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen tellam temgarradem
Day ur teeoiv ara Oebbi Issen i illan deg igenni akked tmurt? Ayagi, s tidep, di Tezmamt. Ih, ayagi ishel i Oebbi
La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu, ayen ur ssinen. Imednas, ur illi wa ara ten isellken

Ma mlan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, a paaqlev asmmummi deg udmawen n wid ijehlen. Qoib ad eevmen $ef wid i sen iqqaoen issekniyen nne£. Ini: "a kwen xebboe$ af wayen i$elben aya: times i Iaahed Oebbi i wid ijehlen". A tu$alin tucmip

A yimdanen! Ippunefk ed umedya, selt as d: ih, wid u$uo tepnujum, war Oebbi, ur zmiren, d awez$i, a d xelqen izi, xas mlalen $ef waya. Ma illa wayen i sen iuker yizi, ur zmiren ad as t id kksen. D uohif umsuter, d uohif win issuter
Ur qudoen ara Oebbi, azal n lqedo iS. Ih, Oebbi d Uohid, d Uzmir
Oebbi Iferren imazanen ger lmalayek, u ger imdanen. Ih, Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ar Oebbi ad u$alen lumuo
A wid iumnen! Iiinzet u knut, aabdet Mass nnwen, xedmet lxio, amar a prebeem

Jahdet ar Oebbi leeqq ujahed iS. Neppa Ifren ikwen. Ur kwen Ihejjen ara di ddin, ddin ubabat wen Iboahim. Neppa, i wen isemman, zik, imvuaen. Deg waya, ad yili Umazan d anagi nnwen, u a ppilim d inagan n medden. Ihi, eeallet, zekkit, teiifem di Oebbi. Neppa d Bab nnwen. D Bab amxallef, d Asellak amxallef
